value:
There's something about this
place that gets under my
skin. It's decent enough.$k$pMaybe that's the problem.
It's not at all like places where
the Black Fang met.

We of the real Black Fang never
killed for pleasure.$k$pWe exterminated lowlifes—those
who preyed upon those who
couldn't fight for themselves.

Your weapon is something else...
I wonder if you could use it to
shoot vermin somehow.

My younger brother and I both
delivered the Fang's justice to
evil vermin who deserved it.$k$pBut Linus can be reckless,
especially when I'm not there
to rein the guy in.

The Black Fang has its Four
Fangs, those who really get their
hands the dirtiest. Who are they?$k$pSure, I'll tell you. Two of 'em are
the Angel of Death and the
Blue Crow...Jaffar and Ursula.$k$pAnd of course, there's me and my
brother, Linus... We're the White
Wolf and the Mad Dog.

So, I take it that you're
$Nu?$k$pHey, relax. I bring greetings, not...
justice.

Heh, nice. Almost too good to
believe.
Just about what I expected.

Eh. Guess I'm not a young
buck anymore.

Thanks. Every bit helps when
hunting vermin.

I'm Lloyd—the White Wolf of
Black Fang. Know some vermin?
I'll exterminate 'em for you.

Got some truth for you. You know
the Black Fang that I'm always
talking about?$k$pWell, I'm more proud of what we
were...than what we are.$k$pOh, we've always been covered
in blood, but it was always for a
decent cause—uh, back then.$k$pWhen? Well, before a bunch of
stuff happened. But the Fang
fell into some shadowy business.$k$pStill, being here brings back
good memories of dark deeds
done for the right reasons.$k$pYou remind me of my brother too.
So I'd better stick around to keep
you out of his kind of trouble.
はぁっ！
はっ！
うああっ！
…っな…
Fang's justice!
You won't escape.
Don't blame me for your fate.
It's time for you to die.
Beaten...
Heh
Need someone eliminated? I'll consider it.
This poking and prodding... What are we, children?
We Fangs eliminate lowlifes—no matter how high their station.
In the Fangs, I am known as the White Wolf.
How fortunate that neither of us is a lowlife...or the Fangs would strike.
The law of the Fangs is absolute. There's no wiggle room.
I like your face. Seems like you're the type who values your true family. We see eye to eye on this.
Mm-hmm?
Yes?
All right.
